content.body: Next week, Bloomberg is hosting a Node Collaborator Summit in our office in London. This is a hybrid meeting, fully open to remote participation. We plan to have a session to discuss modules, and it would be great if people from this group want to join in too. Find more information at https://github.com/openjs-foundation/summit/issues/397 . The exact date and time is not yet determined; let me know about your schedule constraints if you want to attend.
If it happens to overlap Pacific 10:00–5:00, I’ll (probably) be able to participate.
